name: 3D Print File
summary: An X3G file is a 3D printer file used by desktop 3D printers with MakerBot or Sailfish firmwares , such as MakerBot Replicator, FlashForge, and Wanhao printers. It contains 3D model printing instructions. X3G files can be created by MakerBot 3D printing software and FlashForge FlashPrint.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Opens in the MakerBot Replicator 3D printer

macos.display_name: Opens in the MakerBot Replicator 3D printer

linux.display_name: Opens in the MakerBot Replicator 3D printer
